title: paNNina pAvam
sahitya:
paNNina pAvam yAvum parandODip-pOghumE aNNal Arumukhanai aDaikkalam aDaindAl


anupallavi

  maNNulaga vAzhvil manam magizhndiDavE eNNip-perap-pENum inba sukham uNDAgum


caraNam    vanna mayilOnadu nannigharE illAda ponnaDit-tuNaiyAl innalaip-pOkkalAm
cennai nagaram Onga sEvark-koDi tAngi annai pOl anbarai aNaivOnaip-paNindAl
